parameters.query: SELECT role FROM restaurant_users WHERE tenant_id=$1 AND restaurant_id=$2 AND channel='whatsapp' AND user_id=$3 AND role IN ('admin','owner') LIMIT 1;
SELECT ticket_id, status, reason_code, created_at, customer_user_id FROM support_tickets WHERE restaurant_id=$1 AND ( ($2='all') OR status IN ('OPEN','ASSIGNED')) ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;

WITH t AS (UPDATE support_tickets SET status='ASSIGNED', updated_at=now() WHERE ticket_id=$1 AND restaurant_id=$2 AND status IN ('OPEN','ASSIGNED') RETURNING ticket_id, status), a AS (INSERT INTO support_assignments(ticket_id, admin_user_id) SELECT $1,$3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t) RETURNING id) SELECT (SELECT ticket_id FROM t) AS ticket_id;

parameters.jsCode: const ok = ($json.data && $json.data[0] && $json.data[0].ticket_id); return [{json:{...$json, adminReplyText: ok ? ('‚úÖ Ticket #' + ok + ' pris.') : '‚ö†Ô∏è Ticket introuvable.'}}];

parameters.query: UPDATE support_tickets SET status='CLOSED', closed_at=now(), updated_at=now() WHERE ticket_id=$1 AND restaurant_id=$2 RETURNING ticket_id;

parameters.jsCode: const ok = ($json.data && $json.data[0] && $json.data[0].ticket_id); return [{json:{...$json, adminReplyText: ok ? ('‚úÖ Ticket #' + ok + ' cl√¥tur√©.') : '‚ö†Ô∏è Ticket introuvable.'}}];

parameters.query: SELECT ticket_id, tenant_id, restaurant_id, channel, conversation_key, customer_user_id, status FROM support_tickets WHERE ticket_id=$1 AND restaurant_id=$2 LIMIT 1;
INSERT INTO support_ticket_messages(ticket_id, direction, from_user_id, to_user_id, body_text, meta_json) VALUES ($1,'OUTBOUND',$2,$3,$4,$5::jsonb) RETURNING id;

INSERT INTO outbound_messages(tenant_id, restaurant_id, channel, conversation_key, user_id, template_key, locale, payload_json, outbox_dedupe_key, status) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8::jsonb,$9,'PENDING') ON CONFLICT (outbox_dedupe_key) DO NOTHING;

INSERT INTO outbound_messages(tenant_id, restaurant_id, channel, conversation_key, user_id, template_key, locale, payload_json, outbox_dedupe_key, status) VALUES ($1,$2,$3,$4,$5,$6,$7,$8::jsonb,$9,'PENDING') ON CONFLICT (outbox_dedupe_key) DO NOTHING;

SELECT tenant_id, key, locale, content, variables
FROM public.message_templates
WHERE (tenant_id=$1 OR tenant_id='_GLOBAL')
  AND key=$2 AND locale=lower($3)
ORDER BY CASE WHEN tenant_id=$1 THEN 0 ELSE 1 END
LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO public.message_templates(tenant_id, key, locale, content, variables)
VALUES ($1,$2,lower($3),$4, COALESCE((SELECT variables FROM public.message_templates WHERE tenant_id=$1 AND key=$2 AND locale=lower($3)), '[]'::jsonb))
ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, key, locale) DO UPDATE
  SET content=EXCLUDED.content, updated_at=now()
RETURNING tenant_id, key, locale, content, variables;

INSERT INTO public.message_templates(tenant_id, key, locale, content, variables)
VALUES ($1,$2,lower($3), COALESCE((SELECT content FROM public.message_templates WHERE tenant_id=$1 AND key=$2 AND locale=lower($3)), ''), $4::jsonb)
ON CONFLICT (tenant_id, key, locale) DO UPDATE
  SET variables=EXCLUDED.variables, updated_at=now()
RETURNING tenant_id, key, locale, content, variables;

SELECT zone_id, wilaya, commune, fee_base_cents, min_order_cents, eta_min, eta_max, is_active
FROM public.delivery_zones
WHERE restaurant_id = $1
ORDER BY lower(wilaya), lower(commune)
LIMIT 50;

WITH inp AS (
  SELECT
    $1::uuid AS restaurant_id,
    NULLIF(trim($2::text),'') AS wilaya,
    NULLIF(trim($3::text),'') AS commune,
    GREATEST(COALESCE($4::int,0),0) AS fee_base_cents,
    GREATEST(COALESCE($5::int,0),0) AS min_order_cents,
    GREATEST(COALESCE($6::int,0),0) AS eta_min,
    GREATEST(COALESCE($7::int,0),0) AS eta_max,
    COALESCE($8::boolean,true) AS is_active
), u AS (
  UPDATE public.delivery_zones z
  SET fee_base_cents=inp.fee_base_cents,
      min_order_cents=inp.min_order_cents,
      eta_min=inp.eta_min,
      eta_max=GREATEST(inp.eta_max, inp.eta_min),
      is_active=inp.is_active,
      updated_at=now()
  FROM inp
  WHERE z.restaurant_id=inp.restaurant_id
    AND lower(z.wilaya)=lower(inp.wilaya)
    AND lower(z.commune)=lower(inp.commune)
  RETURNING z.zone_id
), i AS (
  INSERT INTO public.delivery_zones(restaurant_id,wilaya,commune,fee_base_cents,min_order_cents,eta_min,eta_max,is_active)
  SELECT inp.restaurant_id, inp.wilaya, inp.commune, inp.fee_base_cents, inp.min_order_cents, inp.eta_min, GREATEST(inp.eta_max, inp.eta_min), inp.is_active
  FROM inp
  WHERE inp.wilaya IS NOT NULL AND inp.commune IS NOT NULL
    AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM u)
  RETURNING zone_id
)
SELECT COALESCE((SELECT zone_id FROM u), (SELECT zone_id FROM i)) AS zone_id;

additionalFields.queryParams: ={{[$json.tenantId, $json.restaurantId, $json.userId, ($json.rbac?.role || 'admin'), ($items('C2a - Zone Upsert (DB)')[0].json.zone_id ? 'zone_update' : 'zone_create'), 'zone', String($items('C2a - Zone Upsert (DB)')[0].json.zone_id || ''), JSON.stringify({wilaya:$json.adminZoneWilaya, commune:$json.adminZoneCommune, fee:$json.adminZoneFeeCents, min:$json.adminZoneMinCents, etaMin:$json.adminZoneEtaMin, etaMax:$json.adminZoneEtaMax, active:$json.adminZoneActive})]}}
